main.name: Fernando Daniel
main.bio: Self-taught developer, attentive to new technologies to provide the best solutions.
main.bio2: I like web and mobile development, and everything related to artificial intelligence.
main.bio3: Without music and coffee I can't live.
main.bio4: 'INSIST, PERSIST, RESIST, AND NEVER GIVE UP'.
main.contactmessage: If you need any advice or if I can help you in any way, do not hesitate to contact me.
